newsitem.title: UK: CRICKET-ENGLISH COUNTY CHAMPIONSHIP CLOSE SCORES.
newsitem.headline: CRICKET-ENGLISH COUNTY CHAMPIONSHIP CLOSE SCORES.

text.p: Close of play scores on the third day of remaining English county championship matches on Friday:
At Lord's: Middlesex 442-8 declared and 91-1, Hampshire 306-5 declared (M.Keech 78 not out, G.White 62)
Northampton: Worcestershire 551 and 219-5 (K.Spiring 84, G.Haynes 50), Northamptonshire 403-5 declared (R.Warren 174 not out, A.Fordham 57)
The Oval: Surrey 350-9 declared, Durham 136 (Saqlain Mushtaq 5-17) and 241-7 (J.Morris 53, M.Speight 51)
Eastbourne: Sussex 330-6 (N.Taylor 122 not out, K.Newell 64, P.Jarvis 55) v Leicestershire
Canterbury: Kent 525-9 declared, Essex 156 and 277-5 (P.Prichard 171 not out)
Taunton: Gloucestershire 350-8 declared (S.Young 83, M.Alleyne 70; G.Rose 4-55), Somerset 191-3 (P.Bowler 73, M.Lathwell 68 not out)
